amendment.description: Amendment increases funding for the International Trade Administration's Office of China Compliance by $3 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase funding by an additional $3 million to monitor imports from China.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Brown (OH) amendment (A019) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A019) offered by Mr. Brown (OH).
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Brown (OH) amendment (A019) Agreed to by voice vote.
